body: Used for items that are appropriate to the religion associated with that symbol, items used to oppose enemies of that religion, or items especially suited for divine spellcasters of that religion (such as a phylactery of faithfulness or a phylactery of positive channeling).
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Magic Item Creation/Talismanic components/Example Components/Holy_Unholy Symbol
name: Holy/Unholy Symbol
